channel.title: For each situation, find a linear model and use it to make a prediction
channel.description: There are 55 blades of grass in 1in^2 of lawn. There are 230 blades of grass in 4in^2 of the same lawn. How many blades of grass are in 3in^2 of lawn?

item.title: For each situation, find a linear model and use it to make a prediction

There are 55 blades of grass in 1in^2 of lawn. There are 230 blades of grass in 4in^2 of the same lawn. How many blades of grass are in 3in^2 of lawn?
